mapper.select: select * from view_noticeMember where dept_code is null and notice_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by notice_no
select * from view_noticeMember where dept_code=#{deptCode} and notice_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by notice_no
select * from view_communityMember where commu_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by commu_no

select VP.* from view_projectmember VP join member M on VP.project_writer = M.member_id where VP.private_yn = 'N' and M.dept_code = #{deptCode} and VP.project_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by project_title

select C.club_no, C.club_name, C.club_category, C.club_enroll_date, M.member_name from club C join member M on C.club_manager_id = M.member_id where club_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by club_category
select * from view_member where member_id != 'admin' and (member_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or email like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or dept_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by member_name
select count(*) from view_member where member_id != 'admin' and (member_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or email like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or dept_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by member_name
select count(*) from view_noticeMember where dept_code is null and notice_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by notice_no
select count(*) from view_noticeMember where dept_code=#{deptCode} and notice_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by notice_no
select count(*) from view_communityMember where commu_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by commu_no

select count(*) from project VP join member M on VP.project_writer = M.member_id where VP.private_yn = 'N' and M.dept_code = #{deptCode} and VP.project_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by project_title

select count(*) from(select C.club_no, C.club_name, C.club_category, C.club_enroll_date, M.member_name from club C join member M on C.club_manager_id = M.member_id where club_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by club_category)
